problem_text_cn: 三棱柱的三视图如图所示,△EFG中,EF=6cm,∠EFG=45°,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: The three views of the triangular prism are shown in the figure. In △EFG, EF = N_0, ∠EFG = N_1, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:过点E作EQ⊥FG于点Q,由题意可得出:EQ=AB,∵EF=6cm,∠EFG=45°,∴EQ=AB=EF×sin45°=3√{2}cm,故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了由三视图解决实际问题,根据已知得出EQ=AB是解题关键．
